attributes.action: Make a change! Make us all equal! Stop Child abuse! Bring back our freedom!
attributes.additional_details: They abuse there authority and use it against us and treat us as we are animals. We are all equal and all deserve the opportunity to progress and succeed in life. We should be inspiring the youth of today to achieve there goals and dreams! The children are the main point of focus and we need to stop abuse! Abuse of them mentally, physically, sexually and also emotionally!! Freedom is key!!
attributes.background: Bring back our humanity and treat us all like human beings rather than animals. Do more to inspire the youth of today! Create more youth intervention programmes. Stop corruption! Let us live freely as we please on OUR land!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
